person.persName: Rice B. Ruark (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (U.S.A.))

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Mason County, Kentucky, native. Son of Daniel Ruark and Charity Ruark. Married to Catharine Ruark. Father of Thomas Ruark, Henry Ruark, and Martha Ruark. Resident in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Lewis County in 1863. Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as private from July 6, 1863, to December 24, 1864.
